text: A light tube is used for transporting natural or artificial light for illumination. Light tube or light pipe may also refer to: * Waveguide (optics), a device for light transport in photonic devices * Fluorescent lamp, a tubular light-emitting device * In professional wrestling, "light tube" refers to a fluorescent lamp used as a weapon in certain hardcore matches. * LED tube lamps * ADAT Lightpipe, a protocol for digital audio signals * Krause-Ogle box, a waveguide (light pipe) used in nuclear testing ==See also== * Solar chimney, a ventilation device
title: Light tube (disambiguation)
